configuration.title: CanFly Debug
configuration.exceptionOptions.descripti: Configure when exceptions should break (never, always, unhandled). Add more as needed.
When should this thrown exception break?
breakMode.always: breaks when exception handled or unhandled

canfly.launch.mfd10.config.name: Launch MFD3 1024x600
canfly.attach.config.name: Attach
canfly.launch.fs_path.description: Absolute path to the working directory of the program being debugged.
canfly.launch.stop.description: Stop the application before any code is run
